import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Table, Button, Collapse } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; const BeneficiaryTable = ({ beneficiaries, setBeneficiaries }) => { const [open, setOpen] = useState({}); const toggleCollapse = (index) => { setOpen(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [index]: !prevState[index] })); }; const handleEditActivityClick = () => { } return (

{beneficiary.components.map((component) => (
{component.name} {component.activites.map((activity) => { return (
{activity.name} {activity.tasks.map((task) => ( {editActivityMode[`${index}-${compIndex}-${activityIndex}`] ? ( <> ) : ( <> )} ))}
Name of the Work Type of Unit Unit Rate No. of Units Total Cost Beneficiary Contribution Grant Amount Year of Sanction Actions
handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> handleActivityInputChange(index, compIndex, activityIndex, e)} /> {task.nameOfWork} {task.typeOfUnit} {task.unitRate} {task.noOfUnits} {task.totalCost} {task.beneficiaryContribution} {task.grantAmount} {task.yearOfSanction}
) })}
))}
); }; export default BeneficiaryTable;
